Description: This is a demo folder containing the quick-start demo files. You can open them through a web server instead of the folder from the file system else it would break the Ajax data requests.
This folder contains the minified files of JavaScript used for the projects.
This folder contains the Javascript modules used for creating components.
This folder contains the minified CSS files and themes used for styling your project.
This contains the javascript files used in the demos.
This contains image files used in the demos.
This provides the Smart HTML Elements release notes
